Test Case Description: Verify the login screen will appear after click on login page
Test Steps:
1. Enter the valid URL
2. Click the URL

Test Case Description: Enter a valid username & valid password
Expected Result:
1. Enter Valid Email
2. Enter valid password
3. Click on login Button

Test Case Description: Enter a valid username & invalid password
Expected Result:
1. Enter Valid Email
2. Enter invalid password
3. Click on login Button

1. Enter invalid Email
2. Click on next Button

Test Case Description: When user open the login page the cursor should remain in the email text box
Preconditions: Enter the correct URL & check the email text box
Test Steps:
1. Enter the valid URL
2. Click the URL
Expected Result: Cursor should be in the email text box
Actual Result: Cursor should be in the email text box

Test Case Description: Verify after click on the next button password field should be display
Preconditions: Provide correct email and click on next button
Test Steps:
1. Enter email
2. Click on next button
3. Verify password field

Test Case Description: Verify the error message should be display after entering invalid email format
Test Steps: Check the correct button & click the next button
Expected Result:
1. Enter invalid email
2. Click on next button

Test Case Description: Verify after click on next button password field is disable or not
Preconditions: Click the correct button & check the password field
Test Steps:
1. Click next button
2. Check the password field

Test Case Description: Verify whether eye icon is added to the password field or not
Preconditions: Click the correct button & check the password field
Test Steps:
1. Click next button
2. Check the password field

Test Case Description: Verify the error message should display after entering the invalid password
Test Steps:
1. Enter Valid Email
2. Enter invalid password
3. Click on login Button

Test Case Description: Verify after click on forgot email link is disable or not
Test Steps:
1. Enter the valid URL
2. Click the forgot email link

Test Case Description: Verify after click on forgot password link is disable or not
Test Steps:
1. Enter the valid URL
2. Click the forgot password link
